title: Framer Design Essentials
description: Learn to create stunning interactive prototypes and websites

challenges.title: Welcome to Framer
challenges.description: Open Framer and create your first project
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to open Framer and start a new project. Familiarize them with the interface - canvas, toolbar, and properties panel.
hints: Go to framer.com and sign in
Click 'New Project' or use a template
Explore the main toolbar at the top
Notice the canvas in the center and properties on the right

challenges.title: Add Your First Frame
challenges.description: Create and customize a frame element
challenges.instructions: Help the user add a frame to the canvas, resize it, and change its background color. Explain what frames are and how they work.
hints: Press F or click the Frame tool
Click and drag to create a frame
Use the properties panel to change background color
Resize using the handles on the corners

challenges.title: Add Text and Images
challenges.description: Insert and style text and image elements
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to add a text element with a heading, style it, then add an image placeholder or upload an image.
hints: Press T for text tool
Type your heading text
Use the properties panel to change font, size, and color
Insert images from the toolbar or drag and drop

challenges.title: Understanding Auto Layout
challenges.description: Learn to use Auto Layout for responsive designs
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to apply Auto Layout to a frame containing multiple elements. Explain spacing, padding, and direction.
hints: Select a frame with multiple children
Click the Auto Layout button (or Shift+A)
Adjust spacing between items
Change direction (horizontal/vertical)

challenges.title: Create Interactive Components
challenges.description: Make elements interactive with click actions
challenges.instructions: Help the user create a button component with hover and click states. Guide them through the component variants.
hints: Create a frame for your button
Right-click and select 'Create Component'
Add variants for different states
Use the Prototype tab to add interactions

challenges.title: Build a Simple Page
challenges.description: Combine everything to create a landing page section
challenges.instructions: Guide the user to build a hero section with heading, description, and a button using Auto Layout and components.
hints: Start with a main frame for the section
Add Auto Layout for structure
Use your button component from the previous challenge
Align elements using the alignment tools

challenges.title: Preview and Share
challenges.description: Preview your design and learn to share it
challenges.instructions: Show the user how to preview their design in the browser and share it with others.
hints: Click the Preview button (or press Cmd/Ctrl+P)
Test interactions in the preview
Click 'Share' to get a shareable link
Explore publish options
